# announcementWasSuccessfulUserInfoKey

**Type Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the announcement is successful.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated static let announcementWasSuccessfulUserInfoKey: String
```

## Discussion

The value of this key is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object that the system interprets as a Boolean value.

## Notification keys

- **announcementStringValueUserInfoKey**: The text of the announcement.
- **focusedElementUserInfoKey**: The element currently in focus by the assistive app.
- **unfocusedElementUserInfoKey**: The element previously in focus by the assistive app.
- **assistiveTechnologyUserInfoKey**: The identifier of the assistive app.
- **UIAccessibility.AssistiveTechnologyIdentifier**: Identifiers for assistive apps.
